module: Module-level comment: The `carry_look_ahead_adder_tb` module serves as a test bench for the carry look-ahead adder (`dut`). It meticulously tests the `dut` by cycling through all 4-bit combinations of inputs `A` and `B`, and the carry-in `Cin`, with a 5-time unit delay introduced between each test. Outputs `S` and `Cout` are checked for accuracy, ensuring the adder handles binary addition correctly across diverse input conditions. The test concludes with a `$finish` command after all scenarios are evaluated.
